item.title: Google WebFundamentals contributions

List of approved translations: Performance Misurazione performance con il modello RAIL Comprendere la bassa larghezza di banda e la latenza elevata Introduzione a HTTP/2 Il modello PRPL Priorizzare le risorse: fare in modo che il browser ti sia d’aiuto Performance di rendering Evita i layout grandi, complessi e schiaccianti Utilizza proprietà del componente di composizione e gestisci il conteggio dei livelli Ridurre i rimbalzi dei gestori di input Semplifica la complessità di Paint e riduci le Aree di Paint Riduci l’ambito e la complessità dei calcoli di stile Ottimizza l’esecuzione di JavaScript Riproduzione veloce con il precaricamento dei video Coursi Udacity List of approved proofreading:

item.title: Linux Foundation LFCE certification
item.description: Obtained Linux Foundation LFCE (Linux Foundation Certified Engineer) certification! Linux Foundation_LFCE_certificate.pdf (passed on 3th December 2017) The Linux Foundation is the foundation that support the development of Linux and others Open Source initiatives worldwide. The Linux creator “Linus Torvalds“ works under its umbrella and hosts kernel.org website. A LFCE (Linux Foundation Certified Engineer) certified engineer possesses in depth skills of Linux system and is responsible for the design and implementation of system architecture.

item.title: Google Academy for Ads achievements
item.description: Achievements earned in Google Academy for Ads: Google Web Designer Basics certificate (passed on 9th October 2017) DoubleClick Dynamic Creative Basics certificate (passed on 6th November 2017) I’m on the Rich Media Gallery Certified Users list.

item.title: Website improvements
item.description: A lot of hard work has been done under the hood to improve this website: automation with Gulp pipeline for minify and publication off-line support usings Workbox Service Worker secure thanks to DNSSEC support, Let’s Encrypt certificate, HTTP/2 support and HTTP Strict Transport Security technology (via CloudFlare)
